WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 21 JAN
   BY M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 9260 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-52.8S 038-15.6W, 22-07.2S 038-15.6W,
   22-07.2S 039-44.4W, 22-00.7S 039-44.4W,
   21-52.8S 039-38.7W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 133/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 22 JAN 18.
